name: Bachelor of Medicine and Surgery (MBChB)
description: A rigorous 6-year medical program focused on human health, patient care, diagnostics, and surgery.

name: Bachelor of Nursing
description: Prepares students for clinical nursing, patient care, and hospital-based practice.

name: Bachelor of Pharmacy
description: Training in drug formulation, pharmacology, and pharmaceutical practice.

name: Diploma in Clinical Medicine
description: Trains clinical officers in primary healthcare, diagnosis, and treatment.

name: Certificate in Community Health
description: Introduces students to community health promotion, disease prevention, and basic care.

name: Bachelor of Civil Engineering
description: Covers structural design, construction, transportation, and water engineering.

name: Bachelor of Electrical Engineering
description: Focuses on power systems, electronics, and electrical design.

name: Diploma in Mechanical Engineering
description: Prepares students for machine operations, automotive engineering, and manufacturing.

name: Certificate in Electrical Installation
description: Basic training in wiring, electrical safety, and home electrical systems.

name: Artisan in Welding & Fabrication
description: Hands-on metalwork training including cutting, joining, and construction.

name: Bachelor of Computer Science
description: Covers programming, algorithms, AI, and software engineering.

name: Bachelor of Information Technology
description: Focuses on IT infrastructure, networks, cybersecurity, and databases.

name: Diploma in ICT
description: Introduces networking, computer systems, and basic software development.

name: Certificate in ICT
description: Basic computer literacy, office applications, and ICT tools training.

name: Artisan in Computer Repair
description: Hands-on course on computer hardware repair and maintenance.

name: Bachelor of Commerce (BCom)
description: A broad business program covering finance, accounting, HR, and marketing.

name: Bachelor of Economics
description: Focuses on economic theory, statistics, and financial modeling.

name: Diploma in Business Management
description: Equips students with skills in management, entrepreneurship, and operations.

name: Certificate in Sales & Marketing
description: Covers marketing strategies, sales techniques, and customer service.

name: Artisan in Storekeeping
description: Basic training in inventory handling and warehouse management.

name: Bachelor of Education (Science)
description: Prepares teachers for secondary school sciences such as math, physics, chemistry, and biology.

name: Bachelor of Education (Arts)
description: Trains teachers in languages, humanities, and social sciences.

name: Diploma in Early Childhood Education
description: Trains preschool teachers for early learning and child development.

name: Certificate in ECDE
description: Basic training for early childhood caregivers and assistants.

name: Bachelor of Agriculture
description: Covers crop science, animal production, agronomy, and agricultural economics.

name: Diploma in Agriculture
description: Practical farming methods, irrigation, livestock care, and agribusiness.

name: Certificate in Horticulture
description: Training in gardening, greenhouse management, and flower/vegetable farming.

name: Artisan in Agriculture
description: Basic hands-on farming training for small-scale production.
